unorderedList.text: This is a list item in an unordered list

An unordered list is a list in which the sequence of items is not important. Sometimes, an unordered list is a bulleted list. And this is a long list item in an unordered list that can wrap onto a new line.
Lists can be nested inside of each other

sublist.text: This is a nested list item
This is another nested list item in an unordered list

unorderedList.text: This is the last list item

orderedList.text: This is a list item in an ordered list
An ordered list is a list in which the sequence of items is important.
Lists can be nested inside of each other

sublist.text: This is a nested list item
This is another nested list item in an ordered list

orderedList.text: This is the last list item
